Need Purpose (PNP) C.1.C. be _ — ) Purpose (PNP) often serves as a form of engagement for those who are experiencing personal loss or distress. Music can be a healing and can cross the boundaries of where other forms of therapy and fail, music sessions in an inclusive and supportive both a group and individual basis. Purpose (PNP) will offer art workshops for those concerns with their mental health and people a sense of loss or lack of control. This will connections between those who otherwise feel alone and bring a stronger connection between their community.
